subject: Simsonn Plus X frequent disconnect
description_text:
Hi,
I assembled the pedal (clutch, brake and gas) incl baseplate and connected it to my PC to test. The pedals are just on a carpet for this test. When using the latest Simsonn Manager, the USB device often disconnects when pushing the brake in the screen where you see the curves. Any idea what could cause this?

Best regards, Oliver

conversations.body_text: Hi Waste,     Please connect the device to a rear USB 3.0 (blue) port on your PC, and do not use a USB hub without independent power. If the issue persists, please record a video and share it with us via Google Drive, making sure the link access is set to viewable, so we can review your settings.

Hi,

Thanks I'll test this tonight and will report back if this fixed the issue.

Best, Oliver

Hi, just to allow you to close this support ticket, the issue went away as soon as I grounded the controller box to the brake pedal.
